mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO data_field( Component_ID,Name,Code,Code_Name,Data_Type,Nosg,Leng,Prec,Mand,Uniq,Multi_Value,Use_Enum, Index_Type,Index_Store,Required,Type,Order_ID,Access_Type,For_Display,For_Order,Memo ) VALUES ( #{componentId},#{name},#{code},#{codeName},#{dataType},#{nosg},#{leng},#{prec},#{mand},#{uniq},#{multiValue},#{useEnum}, #{indexType},#{indexStore},#{required},#{type},#{orderId},#{accessType},#{forDisplay},,#{forOrder},#{memo} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID,Component_ID,Name,Code,Code_Name,Data_Type,Nosg,Leng,Prec,Mand,Uniq,Multi_Value,Use_Enum, Index_Type,Index_Store,Required,Type,Order_ID,Access_Type,For_Display,For_Order,Memo FROM data_field WHERE Name like "%"#{name}"%" LIMIT #{first},#{size}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM data_field WHERE Name like "%"#{name}"%"

SELECT DISTINCT m.ID,m.Component_ID,m.Name,m.Code,m.Code_Name,m.Data_Type,m.Nosg,m.Leng,m.Prec,m.Mand,Uniq,m.Multi_Value,m.Use_Enum, m.Index_Type,m.Index_Store,m.Required,m.Type,m.Order_ID,m.Access_Type,m.For_Display,m.For_Order,m.Memo FROM data_field m, data_base n, data_base_field_map t WHERE m.ID=t.Field_ID AND n.ID=t.Base_ID AND n.ID=#{baseId}

SELECT DISTINCT f.ID,f.Component_ID,f.Name,f.Code,f.Code_Name,f.Data_Type,f.Nosg,f.Leng,f.Prec,f.Mand,f.Uniq,f.Multi_Value,f.Use_Enum, f.Index_Type,f.Index_Store,f.Required,f.Type,f.Order_ID,f.Access_Type,f.For_Display,f.For_Order,f.Memo FROM data_field f LEFT JOIN data_model_field_map m ON m.Field_ID = f.ID LEFT JOIN data_model c ON m.Model_ID = c.ID WHERE f.For_Display = 1 AND c.ID =#{modelId} ORDER BY f.ID

SELECT f.ID,f.Component_ID,f.Name,f.Code,f.Code_Name,f.Data_Type,f.Nosg,f.Leng,f.Prec,f.Mand,f.Uniq,f.Multi_Value,f.Use_Enum, f.Index_Type,f.Index_Store,f.Required,f.Type,f.Order_ID,f.Access_Type,f.For_Display,f.For_Order,f.Memo FROM data_field f, data_model c, data_model_field_map m WHERE m.Model_ID = c.ID AND m.Field_ID = f.ID AND c.ID = 1 ORDER BY f.ID
